trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um cabeçalho ou rodapé que está associado um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter fornece informações de cabeçalho e rodapé para a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>quando for apresentado no modo de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Se forneceu o estruturador de fluxo de trabalho, os utilizadores podem configurar cabeçalhos e rodapés de página no **rodapé/cabeçalho** separador no **Configurar página** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the
trans-unit.target: SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner com a qual o

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a header; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is a footer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> é um cabeçalho; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> é um rodapé.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estruturador raiz ao qual o cabeçalho ou rodapé é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador dos cabeçalho ou rodapé de na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que os limites de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem associada com o cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para associar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador para a imagem associada com o cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*>associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image*>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref> quando os elementos nele contidos são reposicionados pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o cabeçalho ou rodapé associadas com o designer de raiz de fluxo de trabalho na superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a descrição de texto associada o cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the text description associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém a descrição de texto associada a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador de texto associado o cabeçalho ou rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the bounds for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define os limites para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*>associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter"> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text*>
